No Cold modifiers

More Cold modifiers
No Fire modifiers

mods:

No Chaos modifiers

No Lightning modifiers

Corrupted
Has a Corrupted implicit modifier

items.name: Hollow Fossil

properties.Applies to: Weapons, Body Armour, Helmets, Gloves, Boots

mods: Has an Abyssal socket

items.name: Fractured Fossil
mods:
Creates a split copy
Cannot be used to split Influenced,
Enchanted, Fractured, or Synthesised items

items.name: Glyphic Fossil

properties.Applies to: Weapons, Body Armour, Shields, Helmets, Gloves, Boots, Amulets, Belts, Rings, Quivers

mods: Has a Corrupt Essence modifier

items.name: Tangled Fossil
mods:
Makes a random modifier type much more likely and prevents 
another random modifier type
Effects revealed once resonator is fully socketed

items.name: Sanctified Fossil
mods:
Numeric modifier values are lucky
High Level modifiers are more common

items.name: Gilded Fossil
mods: Item is overvalued by vendors
